name: ChangedFilesMultibranch
description: Pipeline task to check if some files changed since last build and support multibranch
author: MohamedElhabib

inputs.name: rules
inputs.label: Filter rules
inputs.helpMarkDown: A glob value per line to filter files that needs to be checked. Also allows to define multiple variables.

inputs.name: variable
inputs.label: Default variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the default output variable to set to be available in next steps/jobs/stages.

inputs.name: isOutput
inputs.label: Is output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Are variables available in next stages?

inputs.name: refBranch
inputs.label: Reference branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch that will be used as reference to compare in case of multi branches pipeline

inputs.name: forceToTrue
inputs.label: Force to true
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true all variables will be set to true. If should be a dynamic value computed based on pipeline parameters for example.
